actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Ground Transportation.

official_title: To amend the Transportation Equity Act for the 21st Century to correct a high priority highway project for Ann Arbor, Michigan.

summary.text: Amends the Transportation Equity Act for the 21st Century to make funds currently earmarked to replace the M-14-Barton Drive interchange in Ann Arbor, Michigan, available to conduct a study of alternatives to the interchange, including relocation on M-14 - U.S. 23 from Maple Road to Plymouth Road, mass transit options, and other means of reducing commuter traffic and improving highway safety.

titles.title: To amend the Transportation Equity Act for the 21st Century to correct a high priority highway project for Ann Arbor, Michigan.
